price: “Gospodaru moj”, reći će, “zašto si me slijepa oživio kad sam vid imao?”
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
